entry.title: Israel, U.S. Warn of Wider War as Clashes Escalate
entry.content: The two countries have warned about the prospects of a wider war in the Middle East, as Hezbollah and the Israeli military clash and other Iran-backed militias in Syria and Iraq strike Americans.

entry.title: Ukraine Braces for Another Winter of Missile Attacks, Blackouts
entry.content: The impending barrage is contributing to a darkening mood after Kyivâ€™s counteroffensive failed to achieve a major breakthrough.
